entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
